channel.title: Core Protocols on Jade Meskill
channel.description: Recent content in Core Protocols on Jade Meskill

item.title: Is anyone opposed … ?
item.description: Would anyone be opposed to … ? Are you opposed to … ? Or my personal favorite As long as no one is opposed … I hear this question, under many different guises, throughout the day. I cringe every time I hear it, especially when it comes out of my own mouth. The question sets up a challenge: “Do you dare prevent me from … ?
